name: Deadly Bike 4x4 Quad Racer
description:
Deadly bike 4x4 quad racer 2018 is one of the best 4 wheeler monster bike game. In this dirt bike game, you have to perform offroad stunts on deadliest tracks by showing your professional offroad driving skills to the world. Quad bike simulator is the newest addictive game fully packed with thrilling missions and challenging offroad tasks.

Grab the handle of the racing moto for showing quad bike impossible stunts by riding on the impossible tracks of hilly areas. Driving on the dangerous tracks would let you improve your offroad driving skills in the extreme conditions. Different kinds of hurdles, jumps, and obstacles are designed for making you the professional rider of moto bike tricks on the impossible tracks of offroad areas. For crossing these obstacles and hurdles you have to be a dared driver. Be a legendary quadcopter biker hero by performing deadly quad stunts and by driving viciously unlike other bike driving games 2018.

Driving of 4x4 wheeler quad bike on challenging impossible turns at deadly locations and hurdles would make this game more exciting and interesting for american quad bike lovers. Perform 4 wheels quad bike drifting on the edges of sharp turns to reach your destination on minimum time. Drive extremely fast but you should have full control on your offroad quad bike otherwise your one mistake can end the game and you have to restart your crazy game again from the very beginning of the mission. You would find this game like you are in quad bike racing game and racing against other quad bike racers on offroad racing tracks.

Reduce your speed while crossing steep paths to avoid any disastrous situation while jumping from any ramp or hurdle, otherwise, your luxury atv quad bike would be crashed and you have to start the game from the starting of that particular mission in which you lose the game. Cross all the checkpoints to reach the finish point in minimum time for showing your pro quad bike driving skills. Play as stunt bike rider riding on mega ramps and deadly hurdles. Take high jumps with fast speed for performing bike stunts in the air.

This game would give you new experience different from other new quad bike racing games 2018 because in this game you have to compete against yourself only. You have no opponent, you have to break your own records by yourself for becoming super quad bike hero. Take risk jumps on deadly ramps. Drive against land sliding and big rocks rolling towards yourself, so drive fast and save yourself for reaching the finish point in limited time.

You have to challenge yourself by driving against yourself and perform new motor bike stunts that are impossible to perform for ordinary drivers. Accelerate your speed like in other rock climbing games and cross through deadly ramps, threatening pendulums that can hit you hard and can take your game life. You should have the passion for playing such an addicting quad bike stunt game. There are no safari driving rules in this off-road driving game, you have to create your own rules and regulations for winning the street bike stunt game at any cost.

*** Features of Quad Bike Offroad Driving Stunts racer 2018 ***
- Realistic physic based quad bike controls
- real damping and suspension affects
- the realistic offroad environment with deadly sharp turns
- variety of obstacles and mega ramps
- multiple challenging missions with the variety of hurdles

Just download this new quad bike stunt game for enjoying real mud racing game. Drive 4 wheeler monster bike for extreme excitement and fun.
